 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/550094/FCA5F56C95C61A8B5E0455945A9337D8/untitled-design-2024-06-27t121658-383.png> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/544518/EA5451AEC8C1A8A08E231DEEFE8086E5/nuggets-10.png> 	

TANAGRA CELEBRATES QATAR NATIONAL DAY

Tanagra marked Qatar National Day at its Vendome Mall store with a display of exclusive collections by Reflections Copenhagen and Villari, designed specifically for the occasion. Guests immersed themselves in celebrations that featured quotes inspired by Qatar, a live boat carving demonstration and more! 

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/550729/114DC3A874518B38474194B06AA32D5B/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-70.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/547619/271F9EC4ABC921EE71EE22ED78E143EE/nuggets-13.png> 	

TREE PLANTING INITIATIVE IN EGYPT

Our Beauty Division team in Egypt partnered with the Shagrha for Sustainable Development initiative to plant 100 trees at a local school. 

This collaboration created a positive impact and fostered great energy between our team members and the students.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/550730/D153E865D6E34C16AF057F6CB06B0143/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-71.gif> 	
 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/545199/221064D23416E5E095233A004E5D27B8/nuggets-21.png>

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/545199/221064D23416E5E095233A004E5D27B8/nuggets-21.png> 	

TEAM-BUILDING OFFSITE IN BAHRAIN

The People Team and Admin Team in Bahrain recently participated in a joint offsite team-building event aimed at strengthening their bonds and enhancing collaboration.

The day fostered teamwork while also creating lasting memories and connections among team members.

 <https://pukschalhoub.blob.core.windows.net/public-media/k8xjuh6urUqpZVt10w1D9Q/550731/80938F7C7B927F44DFA9F8A735D38938/copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-copy-of-internal-news-72.gif>
